main.name: Howard Hontiveros
main.bio: Hi there! I've always been fascinated by technology and software development, which led me to pursue a career as a Back-end Developer. With experience in Laravel, REST APIs, and PostgreSQL, MySQL, I enjoy building efficient and reliable systems that contribute to business success. I'm eager to grow as a Software Engineer in a dynamic company where I can refine my skills, tackle challenging projects, and make a meaningful impact.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to to build any software for your business.!

education.school: University of Perpetual Help System DALTA - Las Piñas
education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology

work.title: Back-End Developer
work.description: Developed and deployed Inventory, Academic, Admission, and Human Resource Management Systems for a Smart Campus Project using Laravel, REST APIs, PostgreSQL, MySQL.

work.title: Software Developer Intern
work.description: Tasked with designing and developing the company's website using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap.
